refnamediv.refpurpose: A UPnP renderer that uses a GStreamer Playbin2 element.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

para.para: Using GstPlayBin2 as a model, it reflects any changes done externally, such as changing the currently played URI, volume, pause/play etc., to UPnP.
Likewise, the playbin can be modified externally using UPnP.

You can retrieve the GstPlayBin2 by calling rygel_playbin_player_get_playbin() on the default player - see rygel_playbin_player_get_default(). You should then set the "video-sink" and "audio-sink" properties of the playbin.
Call rygel_media_device_add_interface() on the Renderer to allow it to be controlled by a control point and to retrieve data streams via that network interface.

refsect2.title: rygel_playbin_renderer_new ()
refsect2.para: Create a new instance of Renderer.

para.para: Renderer will instantiate its own instance of GstPlayBin2. The GstPlayBin2 can be accessed by using rygel_playbin_player_get_playbin().

listitem.simpara: Friendly name of the new UPnP renderer on the network. [in]

refsect2.title: rygel_playbin_renderer_new_wrap ()
refsect2.para: Create a new instance of Renderer, wrapping an existing GstPlayBin2 instance.

listitem.simpara: Friendly name of the new UPnP renderer on the network. [in]
